section.p: For a prisoner who has been chained up without food or water, Akugenda reacts with outstanding vigour. Leaping to his feet, he touches your throat in a caress that suddenly becomes a steel grip.
‘Sorry to be such an ingrate,’ he says, ‘but I could really use a boost of life-energy right now.’
You can hardly believe it - he is using sorcery to drain your soul! to resist.
